name: Surrounded Ship
description:
In Surrounded Ship, you must protect your ship and your gold from a LOT of incoming pirate ships! Aim at the enemy by touching the screen as you automatically shoot. Collect gold from ships you sink to upgrade your cannons!

Features:

- Endless gameplay!

- Upgradable guns!

- Lots of pirate action!

- Simple controls, easy to pick up & play!

- Updates to come!
